messages.msgSnippet: A big one from another group I am on is called ViraStop. I talked to a lot of people who use it and are very happy with it.
messages.messageBody:
A big one from another group I am on is called
"ViraStop." I talked to a lot of people who use it and
are very happy with it.

messages.subject: sore throat was: diaper and medicine issues
messages.msgSnippet: Melissa, You can find homeopathics at any health food store, or online.  There are many brands.  I ve used Hyland s and Boericke and Tafel brands with great
messages.messageBody:
Melissa,
You can find homeopathics at any health food store, or online. There are
many brands. I've used Hyland's and Boericke and Tafel brands with great
success! And each of those brands have a remedy called 'Sore Throat', which
is basically a combination of remedies tailored to that symptom. If I take
the remedy at THE FIRST SIGN of the funk, I beat it every time. Now, I keep
it on hand always. And it's inexpensive, another bonus! :)

Glad to hear her throat is better!

Blessings,
Karen


--
"When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know
peace."
Jimi Hendrix
